title: Client Partner, Communications

pay_input_ranges.title: Dialexa Client Partner Base Salary Range
pay_input_ranges.blurb:
The actual salary offered will depend on job-related knowledge, skills, and experience, among other factors.

This position is bonus eligible; bonuses will be based on factors such as employee performance, company performance, and good standing within Dialexa.

All full-time Dialexa employees are offered a full range of benefits, including, but not limited to, medical, dental, and short-term and long-term disability insurance as well as the ability to participate in its 401k plan.

content:
Dialexa’s Client Partners play the critical role of expanding our business relationships with key clients. They are tireless “farmers”--experienced executives accustomed to working closely with sponsors across lines of business, departments, and functions. They work closely with our key clients to ensure Dialexa proposes solutions that address their most compelling opportunities. They collaborate with Dialexa’s leadership, marketing, sales enablement, and delivery team to ensure our solutions meet the needs of our clients and the market broadly. They build a pipeline of extension, expansion and new business opportunities to sustain and grow bookings within their portfolio.Their portfolio is typically focused on clients within an assigned sector and the industries within that sector.
If you have successfully sold custom digital solutions to enterprise clients through a focus on the development of key accounts, we want to talk to you. This is an outstanding role for those seeking rewarding, entrepreneurial work to advance their career with an innovative leader in its high growth space.
What You'll Do:

Drive growth in revenue and margins

Farm! Develop lasting relationships with key client executives to develop a pipeline of new business within the Communications sector by using your experience and expertise to retain and grow key clients through the introduction of new products and services from Dialexa/IBM.
Represent Dialexa and partner with our clients to identify issues & opportunities, understand their constraints, and define creative solutions with compelling value propositions that differentiate Dialexa and add value to each client’s business.
Use your experience and expertise in the Communications sector to assist with prospecting and directional selling through: intellectual property creation, contributions to email/social media/other campaigns; participation in marketing and sales events; the development of business partnerships; professional networking; and other lead-generation activities.

Manage a portfolio of clients

Own the creation and execution of annual and quarterly account plans that position Dialexa as the go-to partner for each client’s Digital Product Engineering needs.
Set and deliver on revenue and profitability targets.
Use Salesforce–Dialexa’s system of record and single source of truth for opportunity account, contact and opportunity management–to ensure alignment with Dialexa’s sales methodology and provide transparency into your pipeline, contacts, and activities.

Monitor execution so bookings translate into revenue, income and referenceable clients

Lead Dialexa’s most challenging client facing engagements
Work with delivery leads to ensure attainment.
Develop and execute overall client engagement strategy, structure and approach working closely with Dialexa’s leadership team and the delivery teams servicing each client.
Ensure Dialexa delivers an exceptional customer experience.


What We're Looking For:

10+ years of previous account management experience in a technology services company, ideally including the sale of custom software development and/or Digital Product Engineering services in the Communications sector.
5+ years of proven success applying your experience in, and knowledge of, the Communications sector, including its: vocabulary; participants/competitors; trends; value drivers; issues; opportunities; and constraints to propose compelling digital solutions that result in seven-figure to multi-million dollar services bookings.
MBA or other advanced degree preferred.
Experienced in building relationships with CXOs and business leaders.
A track record of “exceeding expectations” in account planning, retention and growth.
An expert in the world of technology delivery with proven success leading the delivery of large scale digital transformation and technology engagements.
Experience partnering with prospective clients to solve their complex business and technology challenges in the context of their constraints.
A history of serving as a  trusted advisor to prospects and clients.
Strong presentation, facilitation, communication, customer service collaboration and team-building skills.
A person with situational awareness and the ability to adapt  their capabilities and approach as required.
Strong communication skills, including presenting on general and industry-specific topics across the Communications industries.
The actual salary offered will depend on job-related knowledge, skills, and experience, among other factors.
This position is bonus eligible; bonuses will be based on factors such as employee performance, company performance, and good standing within Dialexa.
All full-time Dialexa employees are offered a full range of benefits, including, but not limited to, medical, dental, and short-term and long-term disability insurance as well as the ability to participate in its 401k plan.Dialexa Client Partner Base Salary Range$150,000—$300,000 USDDialexa is an IBM subsidiary which has been acquired by IBM and will be integrated into the IBM organization. Dialexa will be the hiring entity.  By proceeding with this application, you understand that Dialexa will share your personal information with other IBM affiliates involved in your recruitment process, wherever these are located. More Information on how IBM protects your personal information, including the safeguards in case of cross-border data transfer, are available here: https://www.ibm.com/careers/us-en/privacy-policy/
